title: Claude in Chrome (Beta) and Cowork with Plugins
description: Released Claude in Chrome (Beta) allowing browser control directly from Claude Code, and Cowork with Plugins released on January 30 for customization.

title: GPT-5.2 General Availability
description: GPT-5.2 went generally available across all Copilot plans including github.com, mobile apps, VS Code, Visual Studio, JetBrains, and Xcode.

title: Copilot Metrics in Enterprise Cloud (Public Preview)
description: Released January 29 - Copilot metrics in GitHub Enterprise Cloud with data residency now in public preview, providing enhanced analytics for enterprise teams.

title: Daily Benchmarks Fix and Harness Rollback
description: Fixed a Claude Code harness issue that was introduced on 1/26 and rolled back on 1/28. Users advised to run `claude update`.

title: Cognizant Partnership for Enterprise Scale
description: January 28 partnership with Cognizant to scale autonomous software engineering across enterprise operations and deploy Devin to engineering teams.

title: v0.26.0 - Skills, Hooks, and /rewind Command
description: Released January 27 - Added Skills and Hooks functionality, Agent Skills enabled by default, new /rewind command to take a step back, and enhanced agent capabilities.

title: "What's New" Notification System
description: January 23 update added notification box feature to Codex CLI v0.89.0 that displays when CLI runs for the first time after an update.

title: Devin Review Feature Launch
description: Released January 22 - Devin Review feature with reimagined interface for understanding complex Pull Requests, grouping related changes together.
